1{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Run resource.
5module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Run
6  ( resRun,
7    assembleRelmap,
8    relmapCons,
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Data.Map.Strict                         as Ms
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                  as S
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type                    as T
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data                    as D
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Assert             as C
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Lexmap             as C
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap             as C
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Resource  as C
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Assert.Message     as Msg
22
23-- | Run resource.
24resRun :: (D.CContent c) => C.Resource c -> B.Ab (C.Result c)
25resRun res =
26    do res' <- assembleRelmap $ autoOutputResource res
27       let rslt = C.globalResult $ C.resGlobal res'
28           js   = C.resJudge res'
29       case filter T.isViolative js of
30         []  -> resRunBody rslt res'
31         jsV -> Right rslt
32                  { C.resultOutput   = C.resOutput res
33                  , C.resultViolated = [S.Short [] [] [C.ResultJudge jsV]] }
34
35resRunBody :: forall c. (Ord c, D.CContent c) =>
36    C.Result c -> C.Resource c -> B.Ab (C.Result c)
37resRunBody rslt res@C.Resource { C.resAssert  = ass
38                               , C.resEcho    = echo
39                               , C.resLicense = license
40                               , C.resMessage = msg } =
41    do js1 <- run $ C.assertViolated ass
42       js2 <- run $ C.assertNormal   ass
43       Right rslt
44               { C.resultInput     = C.resInputPoint res
45               , C.resultOutput    = C.resOutput res
46               , C.resultEcho      = B.lineContent O.<$$> echo
47               , C.resultLicense   = group license
48               , C.resultViolated  = S.shortTrim js1
49               , C.resultNormal    = msgChunk : S.shortTrim js2
50               , C.resultClass     = C.resClass res }
51    where
52      run :: [C.ShortAssert c] -> B.Ab [C.ShortResultChunks c]
53      run = let opt = C.resOption res
54            in mapM (C.runAssertJudges res opt) . S.shortGroup
55
56      msgChunk :: C.ShortResultChunks c
57      msgChunk | null msg  = S.Short [] [] []
58               | otherwise = S.Short [] [] [C.ResultNote message]
59
60      message = "" : "MESSAGE" : map ("  " ++) msg ++ [""]
61
62      group :: [(C.SecNo, String)] -> [[String]]
63      group = B.unique . map (reverse . snd) . B.gatherToAssoc
64
65-- | Assemble relmap of assert clause.
66assembleRelmap :: forall c. B.AbMap (C.Resource c)
67assembleRelmap res@C.Resource { C.resSlot    = slots
68                              , C.resLexmap  = derives
69                              , C.resAssert  = asserts } = res'
70    where
71      res' = do result <- S.shortListM $ fmap assemble `map` asserts
72                let asserts2  = fmap fst `map` result
73                    msg       = fmap snd `map` result
74                    msg2      = concat $ map S.shortBody msg
75                Right $ C.resMessagesAdd msg2 $ res { C.resAssert = asserts2 }
76
77      (consLexmap, consRelmap) = relmapCons res
78
79      assemble :: C.Assert c -> B.Ab (C.Assert c, [String])
80      assemble ass@C.Assert { C.assRelmap = Just _ } = Right (ass, [])
81      assemble ass@C.Assert { C.assSection = sec } =
82          Msg.abAssert [ass] $ do
83            trees      <- S.substSlot slots [] $ S.paraPos $ C.assPara ass
84            (lx, lxs)  <- consLexmap slots (findRelmap derives) sec trees
85            relmap     <- consRelmap lx
86            links      <- B.sequenceSnd (consRelmap O.<$$> lxs)
87            let msg1    = C.lexMessage lx
88                msg2    = concatMap C.lexMessageList $ map snd lxs
89                ass2    = ass { C.assRelmap  = Just relmap
90                              , C.assLinks   = links }
91            Right (ass2, msg1 ++ msg2)
92
93-- | Make a constructor pair of lexmap and relmap.
94relmapCons :: (C.GetGlobal' h) => h c -> (C.ConsLexmap, C.ConsRelmap' h c)
95relmapCons hook = (consL, consR) where
96    consL         = C.consLexmap findSorter
97    consR         = C.consRelmap findRop hook
98    findSorter n  = C.ropParaze <$> findRop n
99    findRop       = C.opsetFindRop $ C.globalOpset $ C.getGlobal' hook
100
101findRelmap :: [C.LexmapClause] -> C.FindDeriv
102findRelmap ds sec name =
103    case filter isSameName ds of
104      [def]  -> [def]
105      ds2    -> case filter isSameSec ds2 of
106                  [def]  -> [def]
107                  _      -> ds2
108    where
109      isSameName ((_, n), _)  = (n == name)
110      isSameSec  ((s, _), _)  = (s == sec)
111
112
113-- ---------------------- Automatic output
114
115autoOutputResource :: (Ord c) => O.Map (C.Resource c)
116autoOutputResource res@C.Resource { C.resDataset = ds
117                                  , C.resAssert  = ass }
118    | null ass && (C.featAutoOutput $ C.resFeature res)
119                 = res { C.resAssert = a <$> Ms.assocs (D.datasetClasses ds) }
120    | otherwise  = res
121    where a (c, ts) = S.Short [] [] $ C.Assert
122            { C.assSection = 0
123            , C.assType    = T.AssertAffirm
124            , C.assClass   = c
125            , C.assToken   = []
126            , C.assPara    = B.def
127            , C.assRelmap  = Just $ C.RelmapSource B.def c ts
128            , C.assLinks   = [] }
129
